content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero – Split” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ background_color=”#1e4a75″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ border_width_left=”30px” border_color_left=”#1c3f68″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#BED8CB” text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#bed8cb” header_letter_spacing=”1px” background_layout=”dark” width=”400px” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”125px||125px||true|false”]

Our History

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/our-history-header.jpg”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.1″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center”]

A past to be proud of

History is an important part of any business and everyone’s got one. At JCG we take pride in our evolution and continued growth. With a rich history and proven track record of success, we are constantly discovering, learning, creating and contributing new solutions to improve family experiences.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Timeline” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,3_5,1_5″ admin_label=”Timeline” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ collapsed=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-1997-V2.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”1997″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

Tom Johnson starts offering consulting services out of his home in Naples, Florida.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2000.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2000″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

Tom officially establishes Johnson Consulting Group with the goal of becoming the nation’s premier funeral home and cemetery broker.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2004-V2.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2004″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

Johnson Consulting Group moves its headquarters to Scottsdale, Arizona, where Jake Johnson joins the family business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2006-V2.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2006″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

The company quickly expands its offering, adding accounting, business consulting, surveying, and valuations to its list of services.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2008.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2008″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

Jake launches a web-based survey and sales program called Performance Tracker. JCG moves into a new office to accommodate its growing team.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2009.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2009″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

The largest private transaction in JCG’s history takes place, and the company stages its inaugural Summit.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2013.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2013″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

JCG acquires Thomas-Pierce & Company, once the largest broker in the Funeral and Cemetery profession.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2016.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2016″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

As JCG establishes a new revenue record, additional team members are hired in the areas of management service, accounting, and business development to prepare for further growth.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2018.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2018″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

The company launches its JCG Academy, establishes a formal marketing department, and undergoes a re-branding as it sets yet another revenue record.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Our-History-Spacers.png” align=”center” admin_label=”Spacer” _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/jcg-history-2019.jpg” align=”center” admin_label=”2019″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″ animation_style=”fade” animation_starting_opacity=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_orientation=”center”]

Two courses are added to the JCG Academy: Leadership & Management, Customer Experience. Jake publishes his book, Staying Alive in the Funeral & Cemetery Profession, and enhancements are made to Performance Tracker.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.3.4″ collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.3.4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” global_module=”286″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
